title: Taiwan introduces bill aiming to create regulatory framework for crypto
description:
Taiwan has taken a significant step towards regulating its flourishing virtual asset market by introducing a new bill called the “Virtual Asset Management Regulations Draft,” which aims to create a comprehensive regulatory framework for the crypto industry. The move comes as Taiwan grapples with the exponential growth of virtual assets in the country. The bill’s […]

The post Taiwan introduces bill aiming to create regulatory framework for crypto appeared first on CryptoSlate.
